Google.company_overview: Google conducts rigorous technical interviews focusing on algorithms, system design, and cultural fit
Google.recent_changes: Moved to virtual interviews since Q3 2025, increased focus on system design for mid-level roles
success_tips: Practice LeetCode medium/hard problems
Study system design fundamentals
Prepare STAR method examples
Research Google's engineering principles

Microsoft.company_overview: Microsoft emphasizes problem-solving skills, technical depth, and cultural alignment with growth mindset
Microsoft.recent_changes: Increased emphasis on Azure cloud knowledge, more collaborative coding exercises
success_tips: Demonstrate growth mindset in examples
Study Azure fundamentals if applying to cloud teams
Practice collaborative problem solving
Prepare for behavioral questions about learning from failure

Meta.company_overview: Meta focuses on technical excellence, impact-driven mindset, and ability to work in fast-paced environment
Meta.recent_changes: More emphasis on AI/ML knowledge, focus on efficiency and impact metrics
success_tips: Practice system design at scale (billions of users)
Study Meta's technical blog and engineering practices
Prepare examples showing high impact and fast execution
Research Meta's AI initiatives if applying to ML roles

Amazon.company_overview: Amazon emphasizes leadership principles, customer obsession, and technical problem-solving abilities
Amazon.recent_changes: Increased focus on AWS cloud architecture, more emphasis on cost optimization
success_tips: Memorize and prepare examples for all 16 Leadership Principles
Study AWS services and cloud architecture patterns
Practice STAR method extensively
Focus on customer impact in all examples

Netflix.company_overview: Netflix values high performance, context over control, and ability to work independently
Netflix.recent_changes: More focus on ML and personalization algorithms, emphasis on global scale challenges
success_tips: Study Netflix's tech blog and open source projects
Understand streaming and content delivery challenges
Prepare for high-performance culture questions
Research Netflix's ML recommendation systems
